title: Ecotopia (Repeat)
teaser: How we think about the environment will have real-world consequences for our children and grandchildren.  Today, we talk about new environmental paradigms for life after climate change.  And, we remember the great environmentalist Rachel Carson on the 50th anniversary of her death. New Environmental Paradigm - Bill McKibben; Remembering Rachel Carson - Rob Nixon; Living the Ecotopia Dream - Charles Monroe-Kane; Colors of Nature - Lauret Savoy; Dangerous Idea: We Are More Significant Than We Think; On Our Minds: Michael Lewis & Flash Boys.
